title: Dragon Sorceress Zyra Chibi (+ Speedpaint)

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Dragon Sorceress Zyra

body:
I love this skin so much. <3

Speedpaint: https://youtu.be/C6eEDkdnCpA

enjoy. :)

replies.body: One of the champions I just HATE from the bottom of my heart.
This is really cute and very well done!

This is the cutest thing I have seen in a good while, and I actually look for cute stuff!

This makes me miss playing Zyra mid way back when and blowing people up. One time I killed a TF as soon as he gated in before he could throw his gold card XD

I will have to pick her up again now ^.^

...so i have 3 questions.

1 . who did the line art?

2 . who did the digital art?

3 . will they do requests?

WTF how can a carnivorous Dragon/Plant hybrid killer witch gone Chuck norris look this cute?

I'm convinced, I want to buy 10 of those.
